sub_topic: Probability of a certain stock price change
message_1: At the beginning of the day, a certain stock has a 30% chance of increasing in price by $5 and a 70% chance of decreasing in price by $6. What is the probability that the stock will end the day with a price decrease of more than $5?
message_2: The only scenario in which the stock will end the day with a price decrease of more than $5 is if it decreases in price by $6. Since there is a 70% chance of this happening, the probability that the stock will end the day with a price decrease of more than $5 is 70%.
